scripts.start1: PORT=7777  ORG=Org1 CA=ca1.example.com MSP=Org1MSP CONNECTTION=connection.1.json nodemon  node server.js
scripts.start2: PORT=9999  ORG=Org2 CA=ca2.example.com MSP=Org2MSP CONNECTTION=connection.2.json nodemon  node server.js
scripts.start3: PORT=11111 ORG=Org3 CA=ca3.example.com MSP=Org3MSP CONNECTTION=connection.3.json nodemon  node server.js
scripts.eventOrg1: USER=user1 PORT=7051  ORG=Org1 CONNECTTION=connection.1.json nodemon node monitor_event.js
scripts.eventOrg2: USER=user1 PORT=9051  ORG=Org2 CONNECTTION=connection.2.json nodemon node monitor_event.js
scripts.eventOrg3: USER=user1 PORT=11051 ORG=Org3 CONNECTTION=connection.3.json nodemon node monitor_event.js
scripts.localOrg1: ROLE=developer PORT=7777  ORG=Org1 CA=ca1.example.com MSP=Org1MSP CONNECTTION=dev_config/connection.1.json  node server.js
scripts.localOrg2: ROLE=developer PORT=9999  ORG=Org2 CA=ca2.example.com MSP=Org2MSP CONNECTTION=dev_config/connection.2.json  node server.js
scripts.localOrg3: ROLE=developer PORT=11111 ORG=Org3 CA=ca3.example.com MSP=Org3MSP CONNECTTION=dev_config/connection.3.json  node server.js
scripts.proTest: ROLE=production PORT=7777  ORG=Org1 CA=ca1.example.com MSP=Org1MSP CONNECTTION=pro_config/connection.1.json node ./tests/automateMockDataTest.js
scripts.proOrg1: ROLE=production PORT=7777  ORG=Org1 CA=ca1.example.com MSP=Org1MSP CONNECTTION=pro_config/connection.1.json   node server.js
scripts.proOrg2: ROLE=production PORT=9999  ORG=Org2 CA=ca2.example.com MSP=Org2MSP CONNECTTION=pro_config/connection.2.json   node server.js
scripts.proOrg3: ROLE=production PORT=11111 ORG=Org3 CA=ca3.example.com MSP=Org3MSP CONNECTTION=pro_config/connection.3.json   node server.js
scripts.generateUserTest: ORG=Org1 CA=ca1.example.com MSP=Org1MSP CONNECTTION=dev_config/connection.1.json nodemon node generateUserTest.js
scripts.1eventOrg1: USER=user1 PORT=7051  ORG=Org1 CONNECTTION=dev_config/connection.1.json node monitor_event.js
scripts.1eventOrg2: USER=user1 PORT=9051  ORG=Org2 CONNECTTION=dev_config/connection.2.json node monitor_event.js
scripts.1eventOrg3: USER=user1 PORT=11051 ORG=Org3 CONNECTTION=dev_config/connection.3.json node monitor_event.js
scripts.teste2e: ROLE=developer PORT=7777  ORG=Org1 CA=ca1.example.com MSP=Org1MSP CONNECTTION=dev_config/connection.1.json mocha --exit ./tests/test_e2e.js
scripts.testunit: ROLE=production PORT=9999  ORG=Org2 CA=ca2.example.com MSP=Org2MSP CONNECTTION=pro_config/connection.2.json jest --coverage --forceExit ./tests/test_func_unit.test.js
